meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tiffany Brooks Alexander Schwab Dave Leffler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7877.

td.p: Tiffany Brooks, a writer from Norman, Oklahoma
Alexander Schwab, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
Dave Leffler, a retired police officer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $33,801)

tr.td: IT'S BEGINNING TO LOOK A LOT LIKE CHRISTMAS
EVERYWHERE YOU GO
BE SAFE!
BLANK NEWS
BIOGRAPHIES
CROSSWORD CLUES "G"
